title: 109_hr5944
content: Stop Child Pornographers and Predators Act - Amends the federal criminal code to: (1) prohibit the production, distribution, receipt, or possession of visual depictions of prepubescent children engaging in sexually explicit conduct. (2) prohibit the use of pornographic materials to facilitate sex offenses against minors. (3) ban the distribution in the United States of child pornography produced outside the United States. And (4) increase criminal penalties for sex offenders who have a prior sex conviction involving a minor.
